column1: Tweet:

While we're all in favor of a little extra pie today, here at NASA Armstrong we think you can never have too much pi. 

In honor of #NationalPiDay , we asked our Research & Engineering team to share some of the places we use pi here at Armstrong.

Happy #PiDay! It‚Äôs March 14th, or 3.14 ‚Äì also the first digits of pi, a mathematical constant defining the ratio of a circle‚Äôs circumference to its diameter.

This Hubble image shows a circle of stars around the nucleus of a galaxy called Hoag‚Äôs Object
When we look at a slice of the night sky, ùûπ (or pi) can help us find new planets, calculate orbits, and so much more! For #PiDay, learn more about where we find pi in the universe

Pi takes us far in space exploration. In fact, calculations used for the parachute design for our 
@NASAPersevere
 rover were thanks to pi! 

Pie Get a slice of the celebration this #PiDay
"The money collected will be used to suppress #COVID19 transmission, save lives, fight the infodemic, and accelerate equitable access to vaccines, diagnostics and therapeutics"

"The plan calls for a total requirement of $1.96 billion. We thank all countries and organizations who have already committed funds.
We are now inviting everyone to support the 2021 #COVID19 Strategic Preparedness & Response Plan through the Solidarity Response Fund"

"But as you know, the #COVID19 pandemic is not over.

Three weeks ago, we launched the Strategic Preparedness and Response Plan for 2021, which outlines how WHO will support countries in responding to the pandemic, and the resources we need to do it"
Why are you so dogematic, they ask
Doge day afternoon

Origin of Doge Day Afternoon:
The ancient Romans sacrificed a Dogecoin at the beginning of the Doge Days to appease the rage of Sirius, believing that the star was the cause of the hot, sultry weather.

BTC (Bitcoin) is an anagram of
TBC(The Boring Company)
What a coincidence!
Both do mining & use blocks & chains

FSD Beta has now been expanded to ~2000 owners & we‚Äôve also revoked beta where drivers did not pay sufficient attention to the road. No accidents to date.

Next significant release will be in April. Going with pure vision ‚Äî not even using radar. This is the way to real-world AI.
Doge spelled backwards is Egod

The Biden-Harris Administration has been working around the clock to get America vaccinated. We‚Äôve doubled daily vaccinations, secured enough doses for every American, and opened hundreds of sites across the country.
This afternoon, I‚Äôm joining Vice President Harris and members of Congress to celebrate the passage of the American Rescue Plan. Tune in.

85% of American households will get direct checks from the American Rescue Plan.

For so many Americans, that means they can pay the rent. That means they can put food on the table.  

Share below what the American Rescue Plan will do for you.
All adult Americans will be eligible to get the vaccine no later than May 1.
From $1,400 checks and unemployment relief to vaccines for every American

Big news: Congress just passed President Biden‚Äôs American Rescue Plan ‚Äì a historic legislative package that will turn the page on this pandemic, deliver direct relief to Americans, and jumpstart our economy.
Hey, India. We‚Äôre rolling out our new fleet of electric delivery rickshaws. Fully electric. Zero carbon

Proud of the program we have in India to hire and train deaf associates at our delivery stations. Managers learn basic sign language to be able to communicate. Meeting this group was a moving experience for me.

Amazon partners with thousands of kirana stores all over India as delivery points. It‚Äôs good for customers, and it helps the shop owners earn additional income. Got to visit one in Mumbai. Thank you, Amol, for letting me deliver a package.

Thank you to our customers who donated relief items for a second Amazon Air plane of humanitarian aid. Together, more than 400,000 Amazon-donated & customer-donated items have been provided to those affected by #HurricaneDorian in the Bahamas & the US.

Nice! Amazon ranked #1 best managed company. Definitely the result of strong teamwork from people who care deeply and passionately about customers, their fellow employees, and the environment. Huge thank you and kudos to all Amazonians.
